metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30178 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.11.11. synic_get in arch/x86/kvm/hyperv.c has a NULL pointer dereference for certain accesses to the SynIC Hyper-V context, aka CID-919f4ebc5987.
